description: After a hard day riding his tractor and plowing on farm, Dean Tucker goes into the barn to play with his other machines. He dusts off his Fucksall and jacks his hole like there’s no tomorrow. After getting his ass nice and juicy, Dean bends over for the Monster machine. He loves looking at his face in the mirror of the Monster machine while he’s getting fucked. In the end, he’s ready for the BuddyFucker with a much bigger dildo. It’s all in a day’s work down at the farm.
title: Farmer Dean
